channel.title: A House of Dynamite on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in A House of Dynamite on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kathryn Bigelow Made Political Thriller ‘A House of Dynamite’ to Warn the World About Nuclear Annihilation
item.description: Excitement around Bigelow’s political thriller, which stars Rebecca Ferguson, Idris Elba and Greta Lee, is building as buzz from the film’s first press screenings suggests a gripping return to form.
